theme.title: Compound time. Three 8th notes tied to next beat
theme.para: In this lesson two new rhythmic patterns are introduced:

score.music: (Metrica 6 8 NoVisible)(n * c g+)(n * c)(n * c l g-)(n * n)(n * c)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c)(n * c l g-)(n * n.)(Barra Final))

part.title: Lesson and note the differences
part.para: Note the difference between the first and the second measure and between the third and the fourth. Note how they are formed when putting a tie.

score.music: (Metrica 6 8)(n * c g+)(n * c)(n * c g-)(n * n)(n * c)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c)(n * c l g-)(n * n)(n * c)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c)(n * c g-)(n * n.)) (c (n * c g+)(n * c)(n * c l g-)(n * n.)(Barra Final))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
